author: Peter Wright
content: As one involved in the restoration and continued sailing of many significant wooden sailing vessels I speak with some authority when I tell you a wooden ship is like the old yard brush I have had for forty years. It has had three shafts and fourteen new brushes but it is as good as the day I bought it.

author: Linda Collison
content: It makes me think am I the same person I was 50 years ago? Skin cells constantly shed and new ones grown, hair grows, blood renews, brain cells are lost, uterus gone and not replaced, left kidney gone and not replaced, many new memories made and many lostâ€¦ Thank God my teeth are still original,
